name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Kenneth J. ROE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Roe

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Kenneth J. ROE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 2003, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated May 23, 2003, it is hereby
ORDERED that KENNETH J. ROE be and he is DISBARRED from the Bar of this Commonwealth, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
830 A.2d 953
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Kenneth J. ROE, Respondent.
No. 461 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 30, 2003.
